sys_script_include.description: Get the rate of the requested room
sys_script_include.name: GetRoomRate

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_96c0c9a393860210292f73118bba103b
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1317506_reservei.GetRoomRate</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Get the rate of the requested room</description><name>GetRoomRate</name><script><![CDATA[var GetRoomRate = Class.create();
GetRoomRate.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	// This method is called by GlideAjax when the client script calls it
	getServerData: function () {
		var roomName = this.getParameter('sysparm_roomName'); // Get the data passed from the client script

		// get the room name 
		var roomRecord = new GlideRecordSecure('x_1317506_reservei_reserveit_rooms');
		roomRecord.addQuery('name', '=', roomName);
		roomRecord.query();

		if (roomRecord.hasNext()) {
			var roomRate = roomRecord.getValue('room_rate');
			this.response.setContentType('text/xml');
			this.response.write('<room_rate>' + roomRate + '</room_rate>'); // Set the data to be returned to the client script	
		} else {
			this.response.setContentType('text/xml');
			this.response.write('<room_rate></room_rate>');
		}
	}
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>ignashuu</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-14 16:21:36</sys_created_on><sys_id>96c0c9a393860210292f73118bba103b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetRoomRate</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ReserveIt" source="x_1317506_reservei">309a10ee93210210292f73118bba109e</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="ReserveIt">309a10ee93210210292f73118bba109e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_96c0c9a393860210292f73118bba103b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>ignashuu</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-14 16:36:03</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
